meta.description: Production planning to minimize compensation and storage fees

params.name: contract_orders
params.description: Contract orders for each product and quarter

params.name: production_time
params.description: Production time required per unit of each product

params.name: compensation_cost
params.description: Compensation cost per unit per quarter for late delivery

params.name: storage_cost
params.description: Storage cost per unit per quarter

params.name: production_hours_per_quarter
params.description: Total production hours available per quarter

vars.name: produce
vars.description: Units of product produced in each quarter

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Inventory of product at the end of each quarter

vars.name: compensation
vars.description: Units of product not delivered on time

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(compensation_cost[p] * compensation[p][q] for p in PRODUCTS for q in QUARTERS) + sum(storage_cost * inventory[p][q] for p in PRODUCTS for q in QUARTERS)
objective.description: Minimize total compensation and storage costs

constraints.name: inventory_balance
constraints.description: Inventory balance for each product and quarter

constraints.name: initial_inventory
constraints.description: Initial inventory balance for the first quarter

constraints.name: end_inventory_requirement
constraints.description: Required inventory at the end of the fourth quarter

constraints.name: production_time_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(production_time[p] * produce[p][q] for p in PRODUCTS)

constraints.name: no_production_product_I_Q2
constraints.description: Product I cannot be produced in the second quarter
